title: Alangele
author: Alangele
content: I heard that betting is well developed in Evadav, what trends are doing well there now?

comments.author: Pstelandi
comments.body: Quote from: Alangele on June 21, 2023, 08:01:09 AMI heard that betting is well developed in Evadav, what trends are doing well there now?Yes, and moreover, people generally bet on everything now, so that the vertical will live for a long time. Creo will provide you with everything you need.

comments.author: letteredhub
comments.body: Quote from: Alangele on June 21, 2023, 08:01:09 AMI heard that betting is well developed in Evadav, what trends are doing well there now?This post of yours would be well appreciated under the gambling discussion board as this is a tradition discussion board that has nothing to do with betting but discussions as it concerns bitcoin and crypto trades.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Quote from: Alangele on June 21, 2023, 08:01:09 AMI heard that betting is well developed in Evadav, what trends are doing well there now?Whatever you want to discuss on gambling should be on gambling section . Here is strictly on trading and everything about trading. So you can move it to this link https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=56.0 so that it can properly be discussed.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: Alangele on June 21, 2023, 08:01:09 AMI heard that betting is well developed in Evadav, what trends are doing well there now?Quote from: Pstelandi on June 21, 2023, 08:35:54 AMYes, and moreover, people generally bet on everything now, so that the vertical will live for a long time. Creo will provide you with everything you need.Sounds like a very lame attempt to shill Evadav or whatever it is but for your information OP, we are not stupid here. We can know when someone's post is genuine or just fake. You created 2 fake accounts around about the same time just to shillAlangeleDate Registered:    Today at 07:47:20 AMLast Active:    Today at 08:01:09 AMPstelandiDate Registered:    Today at 08:31:14 AMLast Active:    Today at 08:35:54 AM

comments.author: Rokishele
comments.body: Yes, the topic is not a big deal, but in general I can say that betting is really well developed there. I hope that you have already tried to send traffic to them.
